name: mrcepid-runassociationtesting
title: RunAssociationTesting
summary: Runs rare variant burden testing with various tools

inputSpec.name: association_tarballs
inputSpec.label: list of tarballs/single tarball from 'mergecollapsevariants'
inputSpec.help: Path or hash to list file / single tarball of masks from 'mergecollapsevariants'

inputSpec.name: tool
inputSpec.label: Select the burden test tool to run (bolt, staar, saige, glm, regenie). Required if using 'burden' mode.
inputSpec.help: Select the burden test tool to run (bolt, staar, saige, glm, regenie). Required if using 'burden' mode. Case *MUST* match.

inputSpec.name: mode
inputSpec.label: Run mode for this tool (burden, extract, phewas). See README for more details.
inputSpec.help: Select the type of analysis you want to perform (burden, extract). Please see the README for more details on required inputs. Case *must* match.

inputSpec.name: gene_ids
inputSpec.label: Gene or comma-separated list of genes to extract variants/genotypes for.
inputSpec.help: A valid ENST Gene ID OR Gene Symbol, or comma-separated list of Symbols/IDs (MUST BE IN transcripts.tsv [project-G6BJF50JJv8p4PjGB9yy7YQ2:file-G7xyzF8JJv8kyV7q5z8VV3Vb]) to extract carriers and phenotype/covariate information for.

inputSpec.name: phenofile
inputSpec.label: file with phenotype for association testing
inputSpec.help: Path/hash to phenotype file(s).

inputSpec.name: phenoname
inputSpec.label: Single phenotype name to run association tests for.
inputSpec.help: A single phenotype name to run association tests for. This MUST EXACTLY match the header of the provided phenofile to function properly. Only required if providing a pheno file with multiple phenotype columns (other than IID/FID).

inputSpec.name: covarfile
inputSpec.label: file with additional covariates for association testing
inputSpec.help: Path/hash to additional covariates file.

inputSpec.name: categorical_covariates
inputSpec.label: Comma-delimited list of categorical covariates in covarfile (if any)
inputSpec.help: A comma-delimited list (e.g. covar1,covar2,covar3) of categorical (e.g. WES batch) in <covarfile>. Names MUST match column header. PLEASE NOTE that any covariates named with this option WILL BE IGNORED by SAIGE.

inputSpec.name: quantitative_covariates
inputSpec.label: Comma-delimited list of quantitative covariates in covarfile (if any)
inputSpec.help: A comma-delimited list (e.g. covar1,covar2,covar3) of categorical (e.g. PC1) in <covarfile>. Names MUST match column header.

inputSpec.name: is_binary
inputSpec.label: Is the phenotype binary?
inputSpec.help: Is the phenotype binary (true/false)?

inputSpec.name: sex
inputSpec.label: Run only one sex or both sexes (0 = female, 1 = male, 2 = both) [2]?
inputSpec.help: Run only one sex or both sexes (0 = female, 1 = male, 2 = both) [2]?

inputSpec.name: exclusion_list
inputSpec.label: File of individual IDs to exclude from regression analyses.
inputSpec.help: File of individual IDs to exclude from analyses. Do not use the command to exclude individuals by sex!

inputSpec.name: inclusion_list
inputSpec.label: File of individual IDs to include in regression analyses.
inputSpec.help: File of individual IDs to include in regression analyses.

inputSpec.name: output_prefix
inputSpec.label: Prefix to use for naming output tar file of association statistics. Default is to use the file name 'assoc_stats.tar.gz'
inputSpec.help: Prefix to use for naming output tar file of association statistics. Default is to use the file name 'assoc_stats.tar.gz'

inputSpec.name: run_marker_tests
inputSpec.label: Run per-marker tests for requested tool(s) [true]?
inputSpec.help: Run per-marker tests for requested tool(s) [true]? Setting to false could DRASTICALLY reduce run-time (particularly if -itool=saige).

inputSpec.name: bgen_index
inputSpec.label: list of bgen files to collapse on
inputSpec.help: list of bgen files and associated index/annotation

inputSpec.name: transcript_index
inputSpec.label: transcripts for annotation of association stats
inputSpec.help: transcripts for annotation of association stats

inputSpec.name: base_covariates
inputSpec.label: standard covariates to include in model
inputSpec.help: a file of standard covariates to include in the model. This file follows a very specific format and should not be changed unless absolutely necessary

inputSpec.name: bed_file
inputSpec.label: genotype bed file
inputSpec.help: A plink .bed file of genetic data. This file should have been created by mrcepid-buildgrms

inputSpec.name: fam_file
inputSpec.label: genotype fam file
inputSpec.help: A plink .fam file corresponding to 'bed_file'. This file should have been created by mrcepid-buildgrms

inputSpec.name: bim_file
inputSpec.label: genotype bim file
inputSpec.help: A plink .bim file corresponding to 'bed_file'. This file should have been created by mrcepid-buildgrms

inputSpec.name: low_MAC_list
inputSpec.label: List of low MAC markers in 'bed_file.
inputSpec.help: List of low MAC (max-mac 100) markers in 'bed_file'. This file should have been created by mrcepid-buildgrms

inputSpec.name: sparse_grm
inputSpec.label: Sparse GRM generated by SAIGE step0
inputSpec.help: A sparse GRM generated by SAIGE step0

inputSpec.name: sparse_grm_sample
inputSpec.label: Sparse GRM sample file with row/column names for 'sparse_grm'
inputSpec.help: Sparse GRM sample file with row/column names for 'sparse_grm'
